entities.description: Scale measuring how much prescribed medication has helped mood in the past 12 months.
Scale measuring how much treatment or counseling has helped in the past 12 months.
Criteria used to define an adult as having had MDE in their lifetime.
Respondent classified as having a major depressive episode in their lifetime.

relationships.description: Indicates the degree to which prescribed medication has helped the respondent's mood in the past 12 months.
Indicates the degree to which treatment or counseling has helped the respondent in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent meets the criteria for having had a major depressive episode (MDE) in their lifetime.
Classifies the respondent as having had a major depressive episode in their lifetime based on the criteria.
